page.title: 09 HOME LIFE
page.content: Im an eleven year old girl and I live in Dartford, This is how I spend my weekend. After school on friday I go home have my tea and watch television until 9 p.m. . On Saturday morning all my family go shopping, for clothes and things we need for school ect. After lunch I play with my friends and my Dad usually dose the gardening, if its sunny my Mum likes to sunbath. In the evening the whole family goes to play squash, after squash we go swimming and there is an inflatable dragon for us to play on its great fun. Sunday morning my brother goes football training and my Mother takes me horse riding, after lunch my Mother and Father go to visit my Nan who is in hospital. We have tea at about 6.30 p.m. and then we watch the television until 9.00 p.m. then its time for bed.
